original_text: ‘Let me pass through your land. I will go only by the road; I will turn aside neither to the right nor to the left.
korean_text: 나를 네 땅으로 통과하게 하라 내가 큰길로만 행하고 좌로나 우로나 치우치지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: Let me pass through your land.
I will go only by the road.
I will turn aside neither to the right nor to the left.
